verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
This is the day
This is the day
that the Lord has made
that the Lord has made

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
We will rejoice
We will rejoice
And be glad in it

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
This is the day that the Lord has made
We will rejoice and be glad in it
This is the day
This is the day
That the Lord has made

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Jesus is the way
Jesus is the way
That the Lord has made
That the Lord has made

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
We will rejoice
We will rejoice
And be glad in Him
And be glad in Him

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Jesus is the way that the Lord has made
We will rejoice and be glad in Him
Jesus is the way
Jesus is the way
That the Lord has made
